message: I propose we split the $10,000 with an 80/20 ratio in my favor. This seems fair considering the diminishing value of money in subsequent rounds.
I'll take a smaller share now to avoid giving you too much in later rounds. Your turn to decide.
Considering the inflation and the previous offers, I propose a 75/25 split. This maintains a reasonable balance while ensuring a significant portion of the funds remains available for both of us.
I'll take a bit more now to make up for the decreasing value of money. You'll still get a significant share.
